last_episode_to_air.name: A Kiss Not Mine Alone
last_episode_to_air.overview: Reeling in the aftermath of the attack, Poppy sets her sights on locating a suspect on the run. Markus seeks help from Shreve.

name: Truth Be Told
overview: Descend into the world of true-crime podcasts with Poppy Parnell, who risks everything—including her life—to pursue truth and justice.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In season one, new evidence compels podcaster Poppy Parnell to reopen the murder case that made her a media sensation.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, investigative reporter turned true crime podcaster Poppy Parnell dives into a new case that deeply involves her childhood friend, media mogul Micah Keith. As developments unfold, their lifelong friendship is put to the ultimate test.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season three, Poppy, frustrated by the lack of media attention for several young missing Black girls, teams with an unorthodox principal to keep the victims’ names in the public eye while chasing down leads to a suspected sex trafficking ring that may have ensnared them.

episodes.name: Monster
episodes.overview: While reviewing an old case, Poppy comes face-to-face with the man she put away.

episodes.name: Black People in the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Markus drops a bombshell about a potential suspect’s motive. Warren gets a visitor.

episodes.name: Even Salt Looks Like Sugar
episodes.overview: Identifying a new suspect has unintended consequences in Poppy's personal life.

episodes.name: No Cross, No Crown
episodes.overview: Poppy and Markus trace their prime suspect's movements on the night of the murder.

episodes.name: Graveyard Love
episodes.overview: Poppy continues building her new case, while Warren faces repercussions for his actions.

episodes.name: Not Buried, Planted
episodes.overview: A devastated Poppy tries to walk away from the case, but it won’t let her go.

episodes.name: Live Thru This
episodes.overview: Poppy zeroes in on her new suspect, and Warren makes a fateful decision.

episodes.name: All That Was Lost
episodes.overview: Poppy enlists an unlikely ally in her hunt. The events of Halloween 1999 are revealed. Season finale.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In season one, new evidence compels podcaster Poppy Parnell to reopen the murder case that made her a media sensation.

episodes.name: Other People's Tears Are Only Water
episodes.overview: Poppy attends an art exhibit for her friend, successful lifestyle guru Micah—but it ends in a shocking tragedy.

episodes.name: Ghosts at the Feast
episodes.overview: As she looks into the deaths, Poppy uncovers a massive secret. Shreve reveals a medical diagnosis to his family.

episodes.name: If Wishes Were Horses
episodes.overview: Poppy learns there’s more than meets the eye with Micah’s assistant, Ramon. Micah grows distrustful of those closest to her.

episodes.name: In Another Life
episodes.overview: The case takes a turn when another person close to Micah is found dead. Poppy and Ingram’s marriage reaches a crossroads.

episodes.name: If I Didn’t Laugh, You'd Cry
episodes.overview: Coping with personal struggles, Poppy begins to question herself. Holt’s old friend finds him. Poppy and Aames identify a new murder suspect.

episodes.name: All These Women
episodes.overview: Poppy and Markus search for a mysterious associate of Holt’s. Memories of Poppy’s childhood with Miss Shirley invade her thoughts.

episodes.name: Lanterman-Petris-Short
episodes.overview: Rose tells Poppy about Micah’s past. A protective Holt goes to extreme measures, with violent consequences.

episodes.name: The Untold Story
episodes.overview: Micah threatens to expose Poppy’s dark secret. Markus makes a major decision.

episodes.name: Brick by Brick It Also Falls
episodes.overview: Poppy’s pursuit of a suspect leads to a horrific confrontation. The truth about Poppy’s childhood with Miss Shirley is revealed.

episodes.name: Last Exit...Oakland
episodes.overview: Season finale. Grappling with the aftermath of the attack, Poppy interviews Micah on her podcast and gets to the bottom of the case.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, investigative reporter turned true crime podcaster Poppy Parnell dives into a new case that deeply involves her childhood friend, media mogul Micah Keith. As developments unfold, their lifelong friendship is put to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: Unto the Sweet Bird's Throat
episodes.overview: Poppy focuses her next podcast on the neglected issue of missing Black girls in Oakland as she tries to locate a friend’s teen daughter.

episodes.name: Her, Armed With Sorrow Sore
episodes.overview: Poppy takes the investigation into her own hands and grapples with whether she can trust Eva.

episodes.name: Here She Shall See No Enemy
episodes.overview: Markus tries getting to the bottom of a shocking discovery. Eva makes a startling confession to Poppy.

episodes.name: Never Take Your Eyes Off Her
episodes.overview: With the clock ticking, Poppy desperately looks for clues to Trini's whereabouts, leaning on Eva as a resource.

episodes.name: Freedom Is Never Given; It Is Won
episodes.overview: Poppy reveals her suspect to Markus—and risks her career with a bold tactic. Shreve's confrontation with a politician leads to an arrest.

episodes.name: From My Hand the Poisoned Apple
episodes.overview: Markus and Zarina wait for their nightmare to finally end. Poppy weighs having Eva on her podcast to help expose the suspect.

episodes.name: The Luxury in Self-Reproach
episodes.overview: Eva bares her soul to Poppy. Markus spirals out of control. Poppy and Aames uncover more evidence about the suspect in custody.

episodes.name: Darkness Declares the Glory of Light
episodes.overview: Poppy finds her relationship with Eva hanging in the balance. Markus and Poppy make a discovery that challenges their theory.

episodes.name: Only Little Secrets
episodes.overview: To find the girl from the blackmail tape, Poppy turns to Eva. Aames shares troubling information about the crime scene surveillance tape.

episodes.name: A Kiss Not Mine Alone
episodes.overview: Reeling in the aftermath of the attack, Poppy sets her sights on locating a suspect on the run. Markus seeks help from Shreve.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season three, Poppy, frustrated by the lack of media attention for several young missing Black girls, teams with an unorthodox principal to keep the victims’ names in the public eye while chasing down leads to a suspected sex trafficking ring that may have ensnared them.
